
 Seam Catch Module
 Next Generation Exception Handling
 ${project.version}

 What is it?
 ===========

 The Seam Catch Module is creates a simple, yet robust base for other modules
 and users to create a custom and complete exception handling process.

 Contents of distribution
 ========================

 artifacts/
 
    Provided libraries

 lib/

    Dependencies

 docs/

    API Docs and reference guide
  
 examples/

    Examples for module
  
 Licensing
 =========

 This distribution, as a whole, is licensed under the terms of the Apache
 Software License, Version 2.0 (ASL).

 Seam Catch URLs
 ===============

 Catch Module page:   http://sfwk.org/Seam3/CatchModule
 Seam 3 project:      http://sfwk.org/Seam3
 Downloads:           http://sfwk.org/Seam3/DistributionDownloads
 Forums:              http://sfwk.org/Community/Seam3Users
 Source Code:         http://github.com/seam/catch             
 Issue Tracking:      http://jira.jboss.org/browse/SEAMCATCH

 =============
